A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Best SW movies are A New Hope and Empire Strikes Back. And now The Last Jedi. 

Since Empire ended\, it was a downhill ride (RoJ was bad\, the prequels were bad.) The new movies are better than anything that came out after Empire ended.  While The Force Awakens was ok it was derivative\, and aimed at a new generation of viewers rather than people who saw the first SW in theaters. Rogue One was ok\, well acted\, but had some glaring flaws. 

Now this one - The Last Jedi is the first worthy successor to Episode IV and V. It is familiar yet new. The characters are well constructed and the story is well written. It has charm. The silliness is there\, but it was always there in each and every SW movie ever.

Loved it.
